Class FavouriteThreadsFragment

java.lang.Object

      ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.fragments.FavouriteThreadsFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener
public class FavouriteThreadsFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment

Display the user's favourited threadComments in a list using ThreadListAdapter. Allow user to browse and enter threadComments.

Author:
Artem Chikin
